ygData.subject: EQ Expension...
ygData.msgSnippet: check out the web sites... theres already an expansion fer EQ coming... soon.... ... From: LKW  To:  Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
check out the web sites... theres already an expansion fer EQ coming...
soon....

> From: LKW <leekw13@...>

than
